1. Eclipse 3.3.1.1 with CDT 4.0.2-I200711230800
2. Window -> Preferences -> C/C++ -> New CDT project wizard -> Makefile Project
3. Error Window: "An error has occurred. See error log for more details.
java.lang.NullPointerException"
